page.title: 07DUNDEE - CROP RESEARCH
page.content: Mylnefield Farm {INVERGOWRIE}became a research institute in 1950.It is funded by the Dept.of Agriculture and Fisheries.In 1985 it has expanded to 100 hectares,mainly to the west of { {INVERGOWRIE}and is amalgamating with Pentlandfield,Edinburgh which is closing down.192 people are employed in 11 departments.These are: {1.Mycology and Bacteriology { 2.Zoology { 3.Physiology and Crop Production { 4.Chemistry { 5.Data Processing { 6.Cereal Breeding { 7.Forage Brassica Breeding { 8.Potato Breeding { 9.Soft Fruit Breeding { 10.Tissue Culture and Cytology { 11.Virology At this time the institute is under pressure from the government.
